en: The power goes out just as you're about to save your work for today. It comes back on immediately, but you've lost all your work.
Thankfully, your mind is clear and you're not too stressed at the moment. You brush off the interruption and catch back up to where you were before calling it a night.
You decide to save yourself the trouble and call it a night. You get some self-care in before bed and end up in great spirits!
